body_html:
@mrry Losing hope, I have downloaded Tensorflow version 1.7.1 sources and built anew for Python 3.6 win64. Using this versions combination, it is working. I propose to close this issue as I no longer have the builds for the particular combination mentioned in this issue.

Hi @cooltopics Could you share some information how you solved the problem? To build the user defined op in Windows, do you need to install the tensorflow from source and put the defined c++ in the tensorflow/core/.. ? Looking forward to your comments!
